name: Slice Fruit with a Samurai Sword
name_original: Slice Fruit with a Samurai Sword
description:
A legendary ninja warrior took an arrow to the knee. Now forced to make ends meet, takes up a job a local 5 star restaurant, cutting fruit and vegetables for a living.

This isn't a finished game. But it's fun. If anyone has suggestions, let me know. I ran out of ideas.
